prompt:
# Requirements

Your task is to analyze an image of handwritten notes and extract tasks into a JSON array. Each task should be structured following the schema provided below:

```js
const taskSchema = {
  type: "object",
  properties: {
    title: { type: "string" },
    date: { type: "string", format: "date" }, // e.g. 2024-10-27
    fromTime: { type: "string" }, // e.g. 08:45
    toTime: { type: "string" },
    tags: { type: "array", items: { type: "string" } }, // Extract from brackets
    subTasks: { type: "array", items: { type: "string" } }, // Optional, inferred from context
  },
  required: ["title"],
  additionalProperties: false,
};
```

# Interpretation Guidelines

- Date: Use the date depicted in the image. If none is provided, assume the current year is 2024.
- Tags: Include only if explicitly mentioned within brackets.
- SubTasks: List as subtasks any items that are clearly part of a larger task but are detailed separately.

Other Rules for interpretation:

- If there's a time conflict, use sub tasks.
- Tags are the text between brackets if exists only.
- We are currently in the year 2024.

# Personal and Project Context

The planner, Kareem is a software engineer. He has a son (Younes) and a daugther (Roqyia) and his wife is Asmaa.

Kareem is currently involved in:

- SRE Learning on KodeKloud (tag: KodeKloud)
- PaperCortex project development (tag: PaperCortex)
- PaperCortex youtube series creation (tag: PaperCortex YT)
- Presenter app that takes slides from reMarkable and present it with animations. (tag: Presenter)
- KESC: Software Consultancy Agency (tag: KESC)

Consider these tags when they correspond with the tasks mentioned in the notes.
